name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save RedGIFs, gfycat, Imgur GIFs as mp4

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: download all redgifs, gfycat & imgur gifs open across all tabs as mp4

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download all the RedGIFs, gfycat and imgur gifs opened in all tabs across all windows as mp4 to your default download location - ALL IN ONE CLICK. Just click the extension and it will download all open RedGIFs, gfycat and imgur gifs as mp4.

v1.9 - Added close downloaded tabs feature

Please contact developer if you want support for more websites.
